rows.label: tlk70000122_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Hm? Isn't it obvious why? To
have had the good fortune to
meet...moi! Here! Today!

rows.label: tlk70000122_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Have I got a present for you
lucky guys! Some info to
tickle your eardrums with!

rows.label: tlk70000122_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Ever seen any stone tablets
strewn about Iira?

rows.label: tlk70000122_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Rumor has it that whoever collects all
of them can have any wish they want
granted, or even bring back the dead.

rows.label: tlk70000122_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Perhaps if you manage to
collect them all, you'll end
up with even more good luck?

rows.label: tlk70000122_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, I have no need of such things,
what with being a pro adventurer
and all. Hahaha! Yes, me...
